member.summary: A SingleAssignmentDisposable only allows a single assignment of its disposable object. If it has already been assigned, attempts to set the underlying object will throw an InvalidOperationException.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Disposes the underlying disposable.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is disposed.

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Disposables.SingleAssignmentDisposable.Disposable
member.summary: Gets or sets the underlying disposable.
member.remarks: If the FutureDisposable has already been assigned then it will throw an InvalidOperationException.

member.name: T:System.Reactive.Disposables.SerialDisposable
member.summary: Represents a disposable whose underlying disposable can be swapped for another disposable which causes the previous underlying disposable to be disposed.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Disposables.SerialDisposable.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Disposables.SerialDisposable.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the underlying disposable as well as all future replacements.

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Disposables.SerialDisposable.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is disposed.

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Disposables.SerialDisposable.Disposable
member.summary: Gets or sets the underlying disposable.
member.remarks: If the ReplaceDisposable has already been disposed, assignment to this property causes immediate disposal of the given disposable object. Assigning this property disposes the previous disposable object.
